summary: Ethanol, also known as alcohol, is a common organic compound with the formula CH₃CH₂OH. It's a clear, flammable liquid with a distinct smell and taste. Naturally, it's made when sugars ferment with yeast. Ethanol is what makes you feel tipsy when you drink alcohol. It's used in drinks, medicine (as an antiseptic), and even as fuel for cars. Globally, a huge amount of ethanol is produced each year, with the US and Brazil being the top producers.
title: Ethanol
